experienceTypeDescription: Help us learn more about your experience with cancer.
areYouCaringForSomeone: Are you caring for anyone with blood cancer?
personalInfoDescription: Please provide your contact details and address.

validation.invalidPhoneNumber: Please enter a valid phone number
validation.invalidPostalCode: Please enter a valid postal code
validation.genderSpecifyRequired: Please specify your gender identity when selecting Self-describe
validation.pronounsRequired: Please select at least one pronoun option
validation.pronounsSpecifyRequired: Please specify your pronouns when selecting Self-describe
validation.ethnicGroupRequired: Please select at least one ethnic or cultural group
validation.hasKidsRequired: Please specify if you have kids
validation.allEligibilityRequired: All eligibility criteria must be checked to continue

demographicCanBeTakenIntoAccount: This information can be taken into account when matching you with a volunteer.
demographicCanAlsoBeTakenIntoAccount: This information can also be taken into account when matching you with a volunteer.
treatmentsRecommended: Which of the following treatments have you been recommended?
treatmentsDone: Which of the following treatments have you done?
experiencesYouHad: Which of the following do you have experience with?
selectMaximum2: You can select a maximum of 2.
selectMaximum5: You can select a maximum of 5.
ethnicGroupDescription: People in Canada come from many Ethnic or Cultural Groups and we want to make sure we capture the diversity of Canada. You may also belong to more than one group on the following list. Which of the following do you identify with? Please select all that apply.
lovedOneDemographicDescription: This information can be taken into account when matching you with a volunteer.
lovedOneBloodCancerExperience: Your Loved One's Blood Cancer Experience
lovedOneBloodCancerDescription: This information can also be taken into account when matching you with a volunteer.
treatmentsTheyRecommended: Which of the following treatments have they been recommended?
treatmentsTheyDone: Which of the following treatments have they done?
experiencesTheyHad: Which of the following do they have experience with?
additionalInfoDescription: You may share any additional details you'd like us to know. This space is available for context or information that wasn't captured elsewhere in the form.
experienceNotListed: If any part of your experience isn't listed in this form, please provide it below:
thankYouRequestReceived: Thank you! Your request has been received.
confirmationEmailFull: You will receive a confirmation email. A staff member will call you within 1-2 business days to better understand your match preferences. For any inquiries, please reach us at
confirmationEmail: You will receive a confirmation email. A staff
staffWillCall: member will call you within 1-2 business days to
betterUnderstandPreferences: better understand your match preferences. For any
eligibilityIntro: Our volunteers are a valuable part of our organization and vital to this program. Before continuing, please ensure you meet the criteria below.
eligibilityDescription: Please review the criteria and check off all that apply. You must agree with all statements to become a First Connections volunteer.
reviewCriteria: Please review the criteria and check off all that apply.

eligibility.oneYearSinceTreatment: It has been at least 1 year since yours or your loved one's blood cancer treatment. For people and their caregivers who are on active surveillance or daily medication, it has been at least 1 year since diagnosis.
eligibility.hadBloodCancer: Have had a blood cancer, or is a caregiver of a loved one with a blood cancer
eligibility.willingToPrescreen: Willing to participate in a pre-screening intake
eligibility.willingToTraining: Willing to attend a virtual 3-hour peer support training
eligibility.haveAccessToPhone: Have access and comfortable using the phone and computer
eligibility.comfortableSharingExperience: Comfortable sharing your personal blood cancer experience with others

serviceUserDemographicInfo: This information can be taken into account when matching you with a service user.
serviceUserBloodCancerDescription: This information can also be taken into account when matching you with a service user.
unableToContinue: You're unable to continue this application.
thankYouForInterestVolunteer: Thank you for your interest in becoming a peer support volunteer. You must meet all of the eligibility criteria to continue. Please reach out to FirstConnections@bloodcancers.ca for more information about volunteering with LLSC.
thankYouForInterestParticipant: Thank you for your interest in First Connections. To continue as a participant you must meet each of the eligibility requirements. Please reach out to FirstConnections@bloodcancers.ca if you have questions or need help finding other support options.
thankYouForInterest: Thank your interest in becoming a peer support
mustMeetAllCriteria: volunteer. You must meet all of the eligibility criteria
toContinue: to continue. Please reach out to
forMoreInfo: for more information about volunteering with LLSC.
experienceInfoWillServe: This information will serve as your biography and will encourage potential matches to speak with you.
tellUsAboutYourself: Tell us about yourself: include your age, diagnosis and treatments. Include personal details like if you're married or have kids, what you struggled with at diagnosis and/or treatment, and how you are doing now.
experienceRequired: Please tell us about your experience
wordLimitExceeded: Please limit your response to {maxWords} words
referencesDescription: Please provide contact information for two references who can speak to your character and suitability for this volunteer role.
invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
anythingElseDescription: Is there anything else you'd like to share with us that wasn't covered in the form?
errorSubmittingForm: Error submitting form. Please try again later.
unexpectedStateError: We hit an unexpected state. This step is only shown if you have blood cancer or are caring for someone with blood cancer. Please go back to the previous step and select "Yes" for one of those questions, or navigate to the basic demographics form.
